Commands.Description: Wrapper for iostat with JSON output

Parameters.Name: CPU
Parameters.Description: Display the CPU utilization report

Parameters.Name: Device
Parameters.Description: Display the device utilization report

Parameters.Name: HumanReadable
Parameters.Description: Human readable format (implies --human --pretty)

Parameters.Name: KibiBytes
Parameters.Description: Display statistics in kibibytes per second

Parameters.Name: MebiBytes
Parameters.Description: Display statistics in mebibytes per second

Parameters.Name: Short
Parameters.Description: Display a short (narrow) version of the report

Parameters.Name: Time
Parameters.Description: Print the time for each report displayed

Parameters.Name: Extended
Parameters.Description: Display extended statistics

Parameters.Name: OmitFirst
Parameters.Description: Omit first report with statistics since system boot

Parameters.Name: OmitInactive
Parameters.Description: Omit output for devices with no activity

Parameters.Name: Compact
Parameters.Description: Display all metrics on a single line

Parameters.Name: DecimalPlaces
Parameters.Description: Specify the number of decimal places (0-2)

Parameters.Name: PersistentNameType
Parameters.Description: Display persistent device names (ID, LABEL, PATH, UUID, etc.)

Parameters.Name: Group
Parameters.Description: Display statistics for a group of devices

Parameters.Name: GroupOnly
Parameters.Description: Only global statistics for the group (use with -g)

Parameters.Name: Pretty
Parameters.Description: Make the Device Utilization Report easier to read by a human

Parameters.Name: Partition
Parameters.Description: Display statistics for block devices and all their partitions (device[,device] or ALL)

Parameters.Name: Interval
Parameters.Description: Interval in seconds between each report

Parameters.Name: Count
Parameters.Description: Number of reports to generate

Parameters.Name: DeviceList
Parameters.Description: List of devices to report on (space separated)
